item.description:
Next Friday is Boston's premiere of the movie "Life is bearable. At times..." with reception(open wine bar, donuts, piano, poetry, roses display)
This film is the first and the only documentary on the Grand Dame of world poetry Wislawa Szymborska, 1996 Nobel Prize Winner in literature!
The film also features some of Ms. Szymborska's favorite people - Woody Allen, Umberto Eco, Vaclav Havel, and Jane Goodall - who speak about the mystery of her poetry and her unique vision of the world .

Tickets are $20 and can be purchased at the following web site: https://moviepremiere...

After you purchase your ticket, please post a comment with your reservation saying you have gotten your ticket.
item.how_to_find_us: Will be out front of the theater at 7:15 wearing a purple and gold shawl

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group
